content:
<rule id="observability-0100" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-boot-actuator" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-starter-actuator" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-actuator" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-actuator-autoconfigure" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded library - Spring Boot Actuator">
                    <description>The application embeds Spring Boot Actuator.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Boot Actuator</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
